column4: Hi, my brightness is working from the FN keys on my aspire one (ubuntu 9.10) however the OSD is not showing and the brightness applet is not working either. Any suggestions?
Hi, my brightness is working from the FN keys on my aspire one (ubuntu 9.10) however the OSD is not showing and the brightness applet is not working either. Any suggestions?
odd, I have a compaq mini running 9.10 and everything seems to work OOTB, I understood from someone they are sharing much in common hardware wise
